content.question: The union membership card pictured above is designed to accomplish which of the following?

choices.label: Encourage United States workers to unite against foreign competition
Assure the public that strikes and walkouts were not part of union policy
Link union membership with patriotic and religious images
Point out the dangers of working as a longshoreman
Show that membership in the longshoremenâ€™s union was open only to workers born in the United States

content.answer: Link union membership with patriotic and religious images

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience of a source.
